subject: Hockey, Ice
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Corey Crawford made 39 saves as the Blackhawks edged the Canadiens, 2-1, moving Coach Joel Quenneville past Al Arbour and behind only Scotty Bowman, who won 1,244 N.H.L. games.
snippet: Corey Crawford made 39 saves as the Blackhawks edged the Canadiens, 2-1, moving Coach Joel Quenneville past Al Arbour and behind only Scotty Bowman, who won 1,244 N.H.L. games.
